rules_text:
Job select [i](When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 colorless Hero creature token to it. Then attach this artifact to that creature.)[/i]
Equipped creature has base power and toughness 6/3, has trample, and is a Warrior in addition to its other types.
Equip {5}{G} [i]({5}{G}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
